articles.title: OpenAI declares ‘code red’ as Google catches up in AI race

articles.description: Samsung's Z TriFold is a foldable device that combines the features of a phone and a tablet. It was announced and is now available in the US.

articles.title: ThoughClub Chalamet started off as just another stan account,The Wall Street Journalreports that Simone Cromer — the woman behind the Timothée-obsessed page — has found new success on Substack where she has generated enough revenue to “cover the cost of her summer vacation to Italy” with just a few hundred subscribers.
